text: Virender Kashyap is an Indian politician, belonging to Bharatiya Janata Party. In the 2009 election he was elected to the Lok Sabha from the Shimla constituency in Himachal Pradesh. He was again elected as an MP from Shimla constituency in Himachal Pradesh in Indian General Election 2014. == Early life == The Virender Kashyap born in a agriculturist Koli family of Bhalawag Village of Shimla district in Himachal Pradesh to Vishwa Kumar Kashyap and Daulat Devi Kashyap on 5 September 1950. == Political career == Here are information about posts held by Virender Kashyap: *1998 - 2003: Chairman of Himachal Pradesh Marketing Board *2009 - 2014: Member of Parliament from Shimla Lok Sabha constituency *2009 - 2014: Member of Standing Committee on Water Resources *2010 - Ongoing: Chairman of Advisory Committee on Food Corporation of India, Himachal Pradesh *2010 - ongoing: Member of Consultative Committee, Ministry of Tourism & Transport *2010 - 2014: Member of Committee on Food Management in Parliament House Complex *2014 - 2019: 2nd term Member of Parliament from Shimla Lok Sabha constituency *2014 - ongoing: Member of Standing Committee on Information Technology *2014 - ongoing: Member of Committee on Members of Parliament Local Area Development Scheme (MPLADS) *2018 - ongoing: Member of National Monitoring Committee for the Education of Scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribes and Persons with Disabilities *2018 - ongoing: Member of Consultative Committee, Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment ==References== ==Other websites== *Official biographical sketch in Parliament of India website Category:India MPs 2009–2014 Category:Living people Category:People from Shimla Category:Lok Sabha members from Himachal Pradesh Category:India MPs 2014–2019 Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Himachal Pradesh Category:1950 births Category:Indian politicians
